item.title: MOOC recommendations
item.description: MOOC, Massive Open Online Courses, are good friends of our learning endeavour. If you have used MOOC, you may have suprised massive amout of courses available with no money. I also suprised and confused of what course should I take. I have already used MOOC for nearly two years and learned a lot, mathematical thinking, thermodynamics, blockchain, programming, etc. In this article I will introduce you some couress I especially recommend.
